tool_description: Get Twitter trends with rich outcomes. The results are updated every half an hour. If you have any country/city you would like to be added, please contact us. (For Pro subscription users)

api_list.name: trends
api_list.description: Returns the top 50 trending topics for a specified woeid.

required_parameters.name: woeid
required_parameters.description: The Where On Earth IDentifier for the location you want trends for.
